hook.text: To unlock your phone, you need the right PIN and face recognition. Both must pass.

buildup.text: An AND gate outputs 1 only when both inputs are 1. If either is 0, the output is 0.

discovery.text: This simple rule powers every security check, every condition, every if-and in software.

twist.text: Your processor has billions of these gates. Each makes one tiny yes-or-no decision.

climax.text: Combine enough AND gates with other gates and you get a machine that can compute anything.

punchline.text: Both must be true. That's all AND does.

quiz.question: When does an AND gate output 1?
